name: The Infinite Potato Complex
description:
This game was developed for BitSlap's Potato Salad Jam. The game was developed in 7 days by Nathan Corbyn (@doctor_n_) and also features music by Erandi Huipe.

Using C, X and the arrow keys the player takes the role of Timothy, a young boy with advanced potato weaponry, in order to defeat the evil robot armies of Dark Lord Tater, and free the town of Potat from his clutches!

No mouse required! Use the arrow keys to navigate menus and move; C to select or fire and X to go back screens or pick up items.

(Also P to pause)
